alert.note: Alert for Johnson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 11:02PM CDT until September 08 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Johnson County in north central Texas... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1101 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cleburne, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cleburne, Cleburne State Park, Lake Pat Cleburne, Parker, and Rio Vista. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Wind damage with this storm will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
